author: Sonal
title: Satisfied
content:
Bought it for INR 152 during the Amazon sale, and it's worth every paisa I spent on it. The scent is exotic, the shampoo lathers easily and it leaves my hair so soft and silky that I don't need to use a conditioner afterward.

Note: I have naturally straight hair and an oily scalp. Results will differ from hair type to hair type.
aspect_keywords: ['naturally straight hair', 'use afterward', 'straight hair', 'oily scalp', "n't need", 'lathers easily']
Review:
Satisfied. Bought it for INR 152 during the Amazon sale, and it's worth every paisa I spent on it. The scent is exotic, the shampoo lathers easily and it leaves my hair so soft and silky that I don't need to use a conditioner afterward.

Note: I have naturally straight hair and an oily scalp. Results will differ from hair type to hair type.

title: Made me happy again
content:
This shampoo is very good for dry rough hair and second thing is this made my hairfall reduce in 3 4 wash only
Before dis i probably used head & shoulder antihairfall shampoo and after using head & shoulder my hairfall is going worst ever I have seen and even I got baldness problem
But this nyle made me happy again with this I got my real shine in my hair and I feel healthier again
Thank you so much to the nyle company
Thanks alot

author: Aditi
title: Moisturizing, Pocket friendly & Para been free  fantastic shampoo..
content: One of the best shampoo i ever used..My Hair-fall stopped completely and  it leaves my hair soft , smooth and tangle free.I have used many expensive  so called "premium shampoo" before but it left me dissatisfied only, and my hair fall was just not stopping!!! Honestly i use to feel miserable on  my day of shampoo, as i  would end up loosing so many stands of my hairs, during and after shampoo. But now this worked like a magic  for me.This is absolutely  pocket friendly, very moisturizing, and the most important part is Para been free..I just love this product. Hopefully i am going to continue with this  forever.
aspect_keywords: ['is absolutely', 'ever used', 'not stopping', 'many stands', 'most important part', 'continue forever', 'used before', 'best premium shampoo', 'Honestly use', 'stopped completely', 'important part', 'Hopefully going']
